HOUSE_ASSET_NATURE: Nature and quantity of the house asset is required
OTHER_ASSETS_ASSETS: Securities, bonds, bank deposits, etc. are required
YEARLY_INCOME_ANNUAL_INCOME: Total estimated annual income is required
YEARLY_INCOME_ANNUAL_COST: Total estimated annual cost is required
ASSET_LIABILITY_ELECTION_AREA_NAME_NUMBE: Name and number of the election area are required
